TEXT.English: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.French: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.German: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.Italian: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.Spanish: Bajo una pila de escombros, tu unidad encuentra un Amuleto Corazón.

TEXT.English: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.French: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.German: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.Italian: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.Spanish: En las profundidades de la guarida, tu unidad encuentra a un grupo de cadáveres arrodillados en frente de un trono. Sentado en dicho trono, otro cadáver antiguo sujeta una joya mágica.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.French: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.Spanish: Tu unidad descubre un antiguo artefacto,la Armadura de Abjuración.
